objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point AF System
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Full HD Video Recording @ 60fps

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Durable metal top and bottom plates for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
The banner is a professionally designed promotional layout for a camera product, divided into four quadrants with a clean and dynamic grid system. The top left quadrant features a bold heading using the **"heading"** and **"subheading"** text layers in white, followed by an orange promotional tagline (**"tagline"**). Below, **"promotional_text"** and **"description"** layers present an engaging offer and call to action. The bottom left includes **"features"** in bullet format, the **"price"** in large type, and a vibrant orange call-to-action button composed of **"cta_background"** and **"cta"**. The top right displays the **"product_image"**, while the bottom right highlights **"quality_text"** and **"accessibility_text"** describing brand values.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#162238`
- Deep Navy: `#1A2845`
- Slate Blue: `#2A3A5A`
- Vibrant Orange: `#FF9D00`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, showcasing a sleek and professional design dominated by deep matte black (#1A1A1A), light silver accents (#D4D4D4), and subtle metallic grays (#4F4F4F). The glass lens displays reflective gradients with hints of cool cyan (#AEE5F9) and soft amber (#F4C873), adding vibrancy and visual depth. These tones blend naturally with the smooth black body, resulting in a modern and premium aesthetic. For an advertisement banner, a monochrome palette with highlights in silver and hints of amber or cyan can enhance elegance while drawing attention to key features. Balanced color placement reinforces the sophistication of the product.
